name: Nam Kue School
description: Nam Kue Chinese School, founded in 1919, is the oldest and one of the longest-running Chinese cultural schools in the U.S., located in San Francisco’s Chinatown. In addition to traditional Chinese language instruction, the school offers classes in calligraphy, Chinese customs, and more.
